explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the connectedness dynamics among eco-friendly assets and the impact of fossil energy markets' volatility on these dynamics. It employs nonparametric causality in quantiles, quantile regression, and kernel-based regularised least squares methods, which are statistical and econometric techniques rather than machine learning or deep learning methods. None of the provided keywords related to machine learning, deep learning, or specific algorithms are mentioned or implied in the title or abstract.
